43 1/2 x 23 1/4 in. (110.5 x 59 cm) (mount) w 63.5 cm w/roller
markings: LRC red artist\'s seal: 長春之印 {Chōshun no in}
medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gofun on silk
signed: LRC: 日本繪宮川長春圖 {Nihon-e Miyagawa Chōshun zu} (Japanese picture drawn by Miyagawa Chōshun)
text: A prostitute seated in a relaxed position on a game board watches her young attendant cut up what must be a medicinal substance or perfume before placing it in a lacquered box.
title: Seated Prostitute and her Attendant
